details.title: Deliver Meals
details.description:
Drivers to deliver meals. Monday - Friday between 11:00am - 1:30pm
 Must have a valid car insurance and driver's license. Permanent routes or on call available.

details.title: Pack Meals
details.description:
Ensuring that hot and frozen meals are packed from the kitchen into the appropriate routes for volunteer drivers.
 Monday - Friday between 9:30 -11:00am
 Must be able to lift 20lbs

details.title: Seal Meals
details.description:
Ensuring that hot meals are sealed prior to being delivered.
 Monday - Friday 10:00am-11:30am

details.title: Help Our Kitchen
details.description:
Chopping and peeling vegetables
 General meal prep
 Supporting the chef in tasks
 Washing dishes
Packing meals
Sealing meals

details.title: Office Support
details.description:
Answering phones
 Shredding
 Cleaning bags
 Greeting volunteers and clients
 Phoning clients to do check ins
Light office cleaning
 Monday-Friday 11:00am-2:00pm

details.title: Join our team and make a difference!
Helping the Community
details.description: As a Society, we realize that without our team of committed and caring community volunteers, LMOW could not fulfill our mission of helping those in our community who avail themselves of our services. We rely on many volunteers to support our clients - meal deliver and packing, working in our kitchen and general office help. Contact us for more information on how you can help.

details.title: Start your application today!
details.description:
Note: A Police Information Check (PIC) is required to volunteer. If your PIC has expired or you don't have one, we can help you get your PIC completed (at no cost).

If you are interested in volunteering:
- Download the volunteer application and waiver below.
- Fill out the fields in both forms (do not sign)
- Email your completed forms to info@lmow.ca.
- We will contact you to setup a time to come in and chat about your application and to sign both forms.
